mapper.select: SELECT s.group_no, s.group_name, g.game_name, g.subscription_duration, (SELECT COUNT(member_no) FROM baduk.group_students gs WHERE gs.is_approved = '1' AND gs.group_no = s.group_no) AS aproved_num, s.group_size - (SELECT COUNT(member_no) FROM baduk.group_students gs WHERE gs.is_approved = '1' AND gs.group_no = s.group_no) AS group_TO FROM baduk.study_groups s JOIN baduk.game_contents g ON s.game_content_no=g.game_content_no WHERE s.member_no=#{member_no};

SELECT s.group_no, s.group_name, g.game_name, s.group_size, (SELECT COUNT(member_no) FROM baduk.group_students gs WHERE gs.is_approved = '1' AND gs.group_no = s.group_no) AS approved_num, m.name, m.tel, m.email, m.join_date FROM baduk.study_groups s JOIN baduk.game_contents g ON s.game_content_no = g.game_content_no JOIN baduk.group_students gs ON s.group_no = gs.group_no JOIN baduk.members m ON gs.member_no = m.member_no WHERE s.group_no = #{group_no};
